verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1112>Belshazzar<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H1840>me,<s%> even to me, Daniel, <S%H310>after<s%> that which <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me at the <S%H8462>first.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision;<s%> now it was <S%H7200>so,<s%> that when I saw, I was in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> which is in the <S%H4082>province<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and I was by the <S%H180>river<s%> <S%H195>Ulai.<s%>

Then I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H5975>behold,<s%> there stood <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> which had two <S%H7161>horns:<s%> and the two <S%H7161>horns<s%> were <S%H1364>high;<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than the <S%H8145>other,<s%> and the <S%H1364>higher<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H314>last.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5055>pushing<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and no <S%H2416>animals<s%> could <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5337>him,<s%> neither was there any who could deliver out of his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will,<s%> and magnified <S%H1431>himself.<s%>

As I was <S%H995>considering,<s%> <S%H5795>behold,<s%> a male <S%H6842>goat<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%> over the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H5060>didn't<s%> touch the <S%H776>ground:<s%> and the <S%H6842>goat<s%> had a <S%H2380>notable<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> between his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

He <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H352>ram<s%> that <S%H1167>had<s%> the two <S%H7161>horns,<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> on him in the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of his <S%H3581>power.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H5060>come<s%> close <S%H681>to<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and he was moved with <S%H4843>anger<s%> against <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7161>horns;<s%> and there was no <S%H3581>power<s%> in the <S%H352>ram<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7993>him;<s%> but he cast him down to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7429>trampled<s%> on <S%H5337>him;<s%> and there was none who could deliver the <S%H352>ram<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H6842>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself <S%H3966>exceedingly:<s%> and when <S%H6842>he<s%> was <S%H6105>strong,<s%> the <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> was <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and instead of it there came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> notable horns toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

Out of <S%H259>one<s%> of them came <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4704>little<s%> <S%H7161>horn,<s%> which grew <S%H3499>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>great,<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and toward the glorious <S%H6643>land.<s%>

It grew <S%H1431>great,<s%> even to the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> and some of the <S%H6635>army<s%> and of the <S%H3556>stars<s%> it cast <S%H5307>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and trampled on <S%H7429>them.<s%>

<S%H1431>Yes,<s%> it magnified <S%H8269>itself,<s%> even to the prince of the <S%H6635>army;<s%> and it took <S%H7311>away<s%> from him the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H4349>offering,<s%> and the place of his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> was cast <S%H7993>down.<s%>

The <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> over to it together with the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt offering through <S%H6588>disobedience;<s%> and it cast <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and it did its <S%H6213>pleasure<s%> and <S%H6743>prospered.<s%>

Then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> holy <S%H6918>one<s%> <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> holy <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to that <S%H6422>certain<s%> one who <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> How long shall be the <S%H2377>vision<s%> concerning the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H6588>offering,<s%> and the disobedience that makes <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> both the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H6635>army<s%> to be trodden under <S%H4823>foot?<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H505>me,<s%> To two thousand and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6153>evenings<s%> and <S%H6944>mornings;<s%> then shall the sanctuary be <S%H6663>cleansed.<s%>

It <S%H1840>happened,<s%> when I, even I Daniel, had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> that I <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H998>understand<s%> <S%H5975>it;<s%> and behold, there stood before me as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H1397>man.<s%>

I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice<s%> between the banks of the <S%H195>Ulai,<s%> which <S%H7121>called,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel,<s%> make <S%H1975>this<s%> man to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

So he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> where I <S%H5977>stood;<s%> and when he <S%H935>came,<s%> I was <S%H1204>frightened,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face:<s%> but he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H995>me,<s%> Understand, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man;<s%> for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> belongs to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>

Now as he was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with <S%H7290>me,<s%> I fell into a deep sleep with my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground;<s%> but he <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H5975>me,<s%> and set me <S%H5977>upright.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3045>Behold,<s%> I will make you know what shall be in the latter <S%H319>time<s%> of the <S%H2195>indignation;<s%> for it belongs to the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> time of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>
The <S%H352>ram<s%> which you <S%H7200>saw,<s%> that <S%H1167>had<s%> the two <S%H7161>horns,<s%> they are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

The <S%H8163>rough<s%> male <S%H6842>goat<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3120>Greece:<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> that is between his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> is the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%>

As for that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> in the place where <S%H702>four<s%> stood <S%H5975>up,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4438>kingdoms<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> but not with his <S%H3581>power.<s%>

In the latter <S%H319>time<s%> of their <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> when the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> have come to the <S%H8552>full,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> dark <S%H2420>sentences,<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up.<s%>

His <S%H3581>power<s%> shall be <S%H6105>mighty,<s%> but not by his own <S%H3581>power;<s%> and he shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H6381>wonderfully,<s%> and shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> and do his <S%H6213>pleasure;<s%> and he shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6099>mighty<s%> ones and the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Through his <S%H7922>policy<s%> he shall cause <S%H4820>craft<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and in their <S%H7962>security<s%> shall he <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H7227>many:<s%> he shall also stand <S%H5975>up<s%> against the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H8269>princes;<s%> but he shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H4758>vision<s%> of the <S%H6153>evenings<s%> and <S%H1242>mornings<s%> which has been <S%H559>told<s%> is <S%H571>true:<s%> but seal <S%H5640>up<s%> the <S%H2377>vision;<s%> for it belongs to <S%H7227>many<s%> days to <S%H3117>come.<s%>

<S%H1840>I,<s%> Daniel, <S%H1961>fainted,<s%> and was <S%H2470>sick<s%> certain <S%H3117>days;<s%> then I rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4399>business:<s%> and I <S%H8074>wondered<s%> at the <S%H4758>vision,<s%> but none understood <S%H995>it.<s%>
